backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (User, Post, Reaction, InviteCode), state maps, and backend functions for a pseudonymous social platform called Veil, including invite code management, subscription gating, and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two SignupPage.tsx features—anonymous principal guard on form submission and disabling the Create Account button for uninitialized/anonymous principals—to their test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one- to two-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React/TypeScript frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Veil app that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (login, signup, dashboard, create, posts, community, admin) wrapped in a Layout, QueryClientProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component rendering a tabbed interface with sections for public posts, member management, invite codes, post history, and admin signup, with a back-to-dashboard navigation button.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Admin panel tab for managing invite codes, supporting adding custom codes, generating random codes, revoking codes, and copying shareable signup links with visual copy-confirmation feedback.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Displays a paginated, sortable list of all public posts for admins, with per-post delete functionality backed by a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminSignup.tsx: Admin-only form that creates a new user account (bypassing invite codes) by submitting a pseudonym and region selection.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Lists all users in an accordion UI, allowing admins to suspend/unsuspend accounts and change subscription status per user.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin tool that searches for and displays all posts by a given principal ID, with per-post delete capability.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Renders a small styled badge for a given EmotionType (confess, broke, happy) using predefined color configurations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component showing the copyright year and a branded link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, route-aware nav links (including an admin link when applicable), user pseudonym display, and a sign-out button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that composes Header, a flex-growing main content area, and Footer into a full-page structure.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a single user-owned post card with support for inline editing, deletion, and toggling public/private visibility, including word count validation and subscription-gated public posting.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Displays a public post with emotion badge, timestamp, reaction count, and reaction buttons (support/care/strength), preventing owners from reacting to their own posts.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: Shows a warning banner indicating an expired subscription with region-specific pricing details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profile, subscription status, posts, reactions, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and emotion/status color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Protected admin page that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users and renders the AdminDashboard component for authorized admins.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: Authenticated page that fetches and displays all public posts sorted by creation date, with an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing a welcome message, subscription banner if expired, and emotion-based buttons to navigate to post creation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects users to the dashboard or signup based on whether a profile exists.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Authenticated page listing the current user's posts sorted by date, with empty state and a button to create a new post.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Post creation page where authenticated users select an emotion type, write content meeting word-count requirements, and submit a new post.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration page for new authenticated users to choose a pseudonym and region, then create their profile via the register mutation.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Provides helper functions for subscription status checks (active/grace), post/public creation permissions, regional pricing display, and status label formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and hash cleanup to remove sensitive params from the address bar.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Exports word counting utilities with a minimum word count constant (24) and a helper to determine which emotion types require a minimum word count.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Lora, Inter), OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, box shadows, and enabling the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for fixing the signup flow, documenting known issues (invalid principal blob error), completed features (principal guard and button disable in SignupPage.tsx), and a pending backend task to reject anonymous callers in createUser().
